title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the employee as of last day of the record year

department.title: Department
department.description: The Department the employee was working at the Record Year

jobcategory.title: Category
jobcategory.description: Job category of the employee as of last day of the record year

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: Gender of the employee as per human resources records

ethnicity.title: Ethnicity
ethnicity.description: Ethnicity of the employee as per human resources records

position_type.title: Position_Type
position_type.description: Whether permanent, temporary, part time or full time positions

salary_bracket.title: Salary_Bracket
salary_bracket.description: annual salary bracket of the employee (if applicable)

age_bracket.title: Age_Bracket
age_bracket.description: Age bracket of the employee as of last day of the record year

base_rate.title: Base_Rate
base_rate.description: Hourly base rate for an employee

salary.title: Salary
salary.description: Annual salary of the employee (applicable only to full time employees)

is_board_commission.title: is_board_commission
is_board_commission.description: Is this record for a board member or commissioner

prior_year.title: prior_year
prior_year.description: A utility field that captures the previous year

is_previous_year.title: is_previous_year
is_previous_year.description: A utility field that captures if the record belongs to past year

column_1.title: index
column_1.description: Sequence number - This is needed to generate accurate counts for visualization
